bibl.title: The Name Mardochaeus in a Ptolemaic Inscription.
bibl.note: Painted funerary inscription published by: Evaristo BRECCIA, Nuovi scavi nelle Necropoli di Hadra, BSAA 25 = N.S., 7, 2 (1930) p. 108, No. 9 (= S.B. V, 7775; S.E.G. VIII, 418). The name Mardochaeus, corresponding to the Hebrew Mordecai.
HORBURY William, The Name Mardochaeus in a Ptolemaic Inscription.
